string.text: Escort the Ecologists
The scientists have hired you to guide them to a specific location for study. Once their research has been successfully conducted, return them safely to camp.
We need an experienced stalker to lead a few of our the colleagues out into the field for study. Are you up for the task?
Thank you for your protection, stalker. Please take this as a token of our gratitude.
Find the artefact
You have been asked to retrieve the artefact. Bring it back to Tukarev if you happen to get your hands on one.
We are looking for certain kinds of artefacts. If you are interested, I will tell you what we need.
I need you to bring us back artefact. You ever heard of it?
Great! You've found exactly what we are looking for. Take this suit; it offers great protection against the Zone, and I'm sure you’ll be able to command a good price for it.
Brains vs Brawn
Lead a group of Ecologist guards into battle against Bandits.

My researchers are in constant peril. There are bandits all over the area and no one seems to be doing a damn thing about it. I want you to clear the area with some of my men. Don't let their A-levels fool you, these boys know how to fight. Now get out there and lead them to victory!
Excellent work. Thank you.
Clear area of mutants

Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous for some of the locals. You have been tasked to lead a hunting party to reduce the mutant threat within the area. Report back to Trapper after the job is done.
I have organized a hunt to help keep the area around Yanov a bit safer by depopulating the various mutant lairs found in area. I need someone experienced to lead it. Would you like the job?
Thank you, stalker. The area will be much safer for others because of you. Here is your payment.
Assassinate target
Trapper has a high value target that needs to be eliminated.
I have a dangerous threat that needs to be eliminated. Not a mutant this time, but a man. He will not be easy to get to but I promise to pay you well. Are you up for the job?
Excellent work stalker. Here is your payment.
Find weapon
Trapper is looking for a specific firearm in perfect condition. Return to him if you find one.
One of my trappers is in the market for a specific firearm that I don't have available. Would you be able to track one down for me?
I need a gun. The trapper who wants it goes after dangerous game, so he needs it to be in excellent condition. I can pay you well if you find one.
Ah, perfect. This will do nicely. Here is the money I promised you.
Procure mutant parts
Trapper says he will pay well if you can bring him trophies.
I have a bounty out on a particular type of mutant. Are you interested?
Kill this mutant and bring me his part and I will pay you well, stalker.
Ah, another threat eliminated and a new decoration for the camp. Well done, stalker.
Find Basic tool
Basic tools are required by Nitro to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need new tools, stalker, something that is hard to come by in the Zone. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Perfect! This is just what I need, stalker. If you need any of your equipment fine-tuned, I can now do it properly.
Find Advanced tools
Advanced tools are required by Nitro to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an Expert tools. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
Whoa! You found a nice set of tools for me. Here, I promised you some money in return.
Find Expert tools
Expert tools are required by Nitro to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an Expert tools. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
Whoa! You found a nice set of tools for me. Here, I promised you some money in return.
Special Delivery
You need to deliver a message. How did you get caught up in the middle of this?
Alright, I have a very simple job for you. I need you to deliver a message to my pal, Ashot. He needs his PDA fixed - tell him to bring it over here.
Haha, we were just playing a prank on you, stalker. I can't believe you put up with this shit for so long.
I'm here to deliver a message.
Scanning Field
Get an anomalous scanner.
Take the scanner to the anomalous field.
Take the scanner to the anomalous field.
Place the scanner.
Report on the implementation.

Our group is trying their hardest to find out what sort of relationship the emissions and the artefacts have by conducting experiments on anomalous formations. But, our research team isn't quite the most qualified, so we urgently need a volunteer for our mission. I need you to take this advanced scanner and place it near the marked anomalies, the data will be sent to our computers.
I can see that the scanner is working as intended. Thank you stalker, I am very grateful.
Find Drug-making kit
Drug-making kit is required by Bonesetter to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily basis is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

There is. I've been looking all over for a Drug-making kit. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to do work on medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of these kits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Great job! I own you big time.
